cab.content: REPORT OP THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF EDUCATION.1, The Education BiH, with two Explanatory Memoranda, has "been forwarded to the Secretary of the War Cabinot for circu-lation*2. Circulars have been issued by the Board giving particulars of (a) Vacation Courses in Physical Exercises, and (b) a Short Course of Instruction in Phonetics to be held at the University of London.3. One of the galleries at the Victoria and Albert Museum has been placed at the disposal of the Foreign Office for the purpose of an Exhibition of Photographs illustrating the war activities of all the Allies.May 18. 1917.
